# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Reference
* **Title (English):** Letter of Interest for the Development of Atmosphere Observing System Supporting Technologies
* **Title (French):** Lettre d'intérêt pour le développement de technologies soutenant SOA (Système d’Observation de l’Atmosphère)
* **Reference Number:** WS3770075950-Doc3770222661

## Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3770075950
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Trade Agreements:** None

## Project Overview
The Government of Canada, through Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), is seeking expressions of interest for the development of Atmosphere Observing System (AOS) supporting technologies. The project is part of the CSA's space technologies development program (STDP).

## Request for Information (RFI)
This Request for Information (RFI) is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the development of enabling technologies related to potential opportunities for Canadian participation in the AOS mission.

## Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information
* **Selection Criteria:** Not applicable
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada

## Contact Information
* **Contact Person:** Anca Jurca, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email:** anca.jurca@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not available
* **Address:** None

## Tender Documentation
* **Tender Description:** Development of Atmosphere Observing System (AOS) supporting technologies
* **Attachment:** None

## Amendments
* **Amendment Date:** December 21, 2022
* **Amendment Reason:** False closing time corrected for the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and the Buyandsell posting closing time

To follow up on this tender, please visit the SAP Ariba website at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14777383. The Government of Canada reserves the right to hold a Request for Proposal (RFP) in connection with this tender announcement. [1](https://tizalsitti.github.io/)
